name: Street Vending Bylaw Review Online Consultation Meeting
description: The City is conducting a review of the street vending bylaws to expand opportunities for street vendors. The review aims to create a licensing system that reflects the vibrancy of Toronto, with rules that are clearer and easier to follow. Public consultations will take place in September 2025, and a survey is currently open until September 30, 2025.

name: Parent-Child Mother Goose Program - Malvern Community Centre

location.name: Malvern Recreation Centre-Community Room, 30 Sewells Rd. Scarborough, M1B 3G5

description: The Parent-Child Mother Goose ProgramÂ® is backed by decades of research, yet is so simple and natural that parents easily gain skills and confidence to foster healthy relationships and give their children experiences that promote positive brain development, which peaks by the age of three and is largely set for life. All children's early experiences mould their brains, and the primary caregiver provides most of those experiences. The caregiver's choice of words, tone of voice, gestures, facial expressions, holding, and cuddling lay the neurological foundation for the child's lifelong emotional, physical, and cognitive health. The Program prioritizes families in need of support and is always free.
